Can someone please post the links for JUnitEE and JUnitSerlvet?
Thanks.

-----Original Message-----
From: MARZIOU,GAEL (HP-France,ex1) [mailto:gael_marziou@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 8:42 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [junit] Re: Confused about J2EEUnit, JunitEE and
JUnitServlet



Hi Sharmila,

Thanks for your answer, I came to the same conclusion, I will use JUnitEE
because I think that J2EEUnit is well designed and documented but it does
much more than what I need and I found the learning curve stiffer. For
instance, it's not clear to me what is the benefit of having a client side
in J2EEUnit, at least for my purpose.
On the other hand, JUnitEE is very simple and we can customize it easily to
meet special requirements.
Anyway, the biggest effort is to write test cases and as long as we stick to
JUnit, I think it should not be too hard to switch from JUnitEE to J2EEUnit.

Gael
